title: How to use ChatGPT to write essays

title: Stop using your 4-digit iPhone passcode in public. Do this instead

title: Linux desktop powers consider uniting for an app store

title: Storage improvements have outperformed Moore's Law by a factor of 800%
description: In the 1980s, you could get a drive that was the size of two microwaves and the weight of a full refrigerator for $10,000 (roughly $27K today). It held 470 megabytes. Not gigabytes. Not terabytes. Megabytes.
